name: Karat
introduce: Karat is a decentralized protocol that allows projects to leverage Automated Matching Engine (AME) to locate their ideal user-base. The AME starts by collecting on-chain data from the history of each wallet address. Based on the address’ smart contract connection and transaction histories, AME draws out users' profiles based on-chain behavioral patterns. Projects can then use KaratDAO’s smart contract generator to deploy claimable token or NFT rewards and private sales.
